# UIAttachmentBehavior.AttachmentType.items

**Case**

Designates an attachment behavior that connects a dynamic item to another dynamic item.

## Declaration

```swift
case items
```

## Constants

- **UIAttachmentBehavior.AttachmentType.anchor**: Designates an attachment behavior that connects a dynamic item to an anchor point.

items.description: Designates an attachment behavior that connects a dynamic item to an anchor point.
items.name: UIAttachmentBehavior.AttachmentType.anchor
